name: Schemify.Kt
tagline: Schemification and serialization API for Kotlin
body:
# APIs:
* [**Schemification API**](#schemification-api): Creating a scheme of a class.
* Serialization API: Transforming an instance of schemified class from / to other format.

## Schemification API:
Structure of a class can be represented as a scheme by mapping class fields to scheme Props. I.e. scheme here is representation of class state as set of props.
_Example:_
![evo1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5307477/17239649/7207e13a-556e-11e6-9c7f-766be04383bb.png)
[1.pdf](https://github.com/just-4-fun/SchemifyKt/files/389982/1.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
